title.rendered: Can I Remove the “Protection is On” Notification?

content.rendered:
Unfortunately, you can’t remove that notification. Google requires apps that are running in the background to display a “permanent” notification at the top of the device while it’s in use. 

The notification does not interfere with your device usage.
